data.title: Tesla could struggle to implement some of its battery advances, experts say
data.text: The advanced battery cell design and new manufacturing processes outlined by Tesla Inc CEO Elon Musk are promising, battery experts say, but they questioned how quickly they can be implemented and how much they’ll contribute to reducing overall costs.

data.title: Tesla's Nevada lithium plan faces stark obstacles on path to production
data.text: Tesla Inc's plan to produce lithium for electric vehicle batteries close to its Nevada Gigafactory faces stark challenges from the outset, including an onerous permitting process, uncertain access to water and questions about unproven methodologies.

data.title: ARK Invest analyst says Tesla's cost reductions promise success for the company's future
data.text: Tesla stock is down 10 percent after CEO Elon Musk warned it might take more time to develop a cheaper, more efficient battery for its electric cars. The company is aiming to sell a $25,000 electric vehicle in three years.

data.title: Tesla sues Trump Administration to end tariffs on the ‘brain’ of its vehicles
data.text: Tesla is suing the Trump Administration over tariffs on a computer chip and other parts it imports from China, joining an increasingly long list of similar lawsuits filed by hundreds of companies, including automakers Ford, Mercedes-Benz and Volvo. Tesla, which names U.S. Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer in the lawsuit filed in the U.S. Court of […]

data.text:
Analysts are out with their reactions to Tesla Inc's (NASDAQ: TSLA)highly anticipated Battery Day. 
 The Tesla Analysts: Piper Sandler analyst Alexander Potter has an Overweight rating on Tesla with a $515 price target.

data.title: California will require all passenger vehicles sold in the state be zero-emission by 2035
data.text: California Governor Gavin Newsom issued an executive order on Wednesday requiring sales of all new passenger vehicles be zero-emission by 2035. The new order would be a huge boost for electric vehicles, and vehicles using alternative fuels like hydrogen, and could boost a sector that’s already surging in California.

data.title: Tesla experienced an hour-long network outage early Wednesday
data.text: Tesla owners were locked out of their vehicles and the accompanying app for about an hour Wednesday morning, thanks to an outage that affected the company’s entire network, according to several sources. The Tesla outage was caused by an internal break of their application programming interface (or API), according to sources familiar with the outage.

data.title: California Banning Sales Of New Gasoline Cars In The State By 2035
data.text: It’s the single-most aggressive such action ever taken to fight carbon pollution that’s fueling higher temperatures and wildfires in California and persistent air-quality problems from automotive exhaust.

data.title: California to ban sale of new gasoline-powered passenger vehicles in 2035
data.text: California will ban the sale of new gasoline powered passenger cars and trucks starting in 2035 in a dramatic move to shift to electric vehicles and reduce greenhouse gas emissions, Governor Gavin Newsom said on Wednesday.

data.title: Tesla Battery Day: No Sizzle, No Beef, But Lots Of Expensive Secret Sauce
data.text:
Tesla stock fell Wednesday, following the company's highly anticipated Battery Day that set lofty goals but did not meet elevated expectations, such as the million-mile battery as expected.
The post Tesla Battery Day: No Sizzle, No Beef, But Lots Of Expensive Secret Sauce appeared first on Investor's Business Daily.

data.title: The Royal Energy Wedding: Tesla Should Acquire NextEra
data.text: Tesla and NextEra Energy should merge. The combination would be the royal wedding of energy and transportation.

data.title: Tesla’s global network outage disables mobile app functionality
data.text: Tesla owners around the world were dealing with a network outage on Wednesday which left them unable to control their cars via the Tesla app. The electric automaker allows its customers to unlock their vehicles and control features like temperature via the app, but the technical troubles kneecapped the functionality.

data.title: Tesla's former principal Roadster battery designer on the Battery Day announcement
data.text: Gene Berdichevsky, the principal designer of the Roadster battery, joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss Tesla's battery developments.

data.title: Tesla sues U.S. government to overturn Trump administration tariffs on China
data.text: The electric car maker wants the court to declare two batches of Trump administrations tariffs to be void, and refund Tesla the tariffs it paid with interest, according to the lawsuit filed in the U.S. Court of International Trade.

data.title: Tesla's battery announcement was 'underwhelming,' says early Tesla investor

data.title: Tesla's "Battery Day" Is a Dud; Stock Tumbles
data.text: Elon Musk failed to roll out the most-anticipated product.

data.title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk touted new tech at 'Battery Day'—Here's what he said
data.text: At Tesla's 2020 shareholder's meeting, Tesla CEO Elon Musk said that the company's vehicle deliveries in 2020 would be up 30% to 40% from last year, a range that encompasses its previous prediction of 500,000 cars delivered this year. The meeting took place before Tesla's "Battery Day," where Musk and executive Drew Baglino talked about the company's plans to make its own large battery cells, which should lead to more affordable, efficient vehicles.

data.title: Tesla's Battery Day Fizzles, J&J's Phase 3 Sizzles
data.text: J&J  shares are up more than 2% this morning on the announcement it has begun its phase 3 trials for its Covid-19 vaccine candidate.

data.title: Jim Cramer on the market's reaction to Tesla's Battery Day
data.text: Tesla's stock slumped in the pre-market Wednesday after its much-anticipated Battery Day. CNBC's Jim Cramer, Carl Quintanilla and David Faber discuss the event and what's ahead for Tesla.

data.title: Tesla expects approval for battery cells plant in Berlin
data.text: Tesla expects to be able to press ahead with plans to build battery cells and battery packs at its new factory in Brandenburg, near Berlin, a spokesman for the U.S. carmaker said on Wednesday, after assurances it would not use too much water.

data.title: Key Takeaways From Much-Awaited Tesla Battery Day Event
data.text: As Tesla (TSLA) remains focused on reducing battery cost, Musk promises a $25,000 worth electric car, which is likely to be available in the market in three years.

data.title: Tesla's stock falls, but Oppenheimer's Rusch says buy on weakness
data.text: Shares of Tesla Inc. TSLA, -5.59% took a 5.8% premarket hit Wednesday, after investors apparently deemed the electric vehicle company's Battery Day as disappointing, but Oppenheimer analyst Colin Rusch was more upbeat, saying he would be "buyers on any near-term weakness.

data.title: Tesla Is at Top of Its Game, Says New Street's Ferragu

data.title: Why Tesla’s Battery Day Did Not Impress Investors
data.text: Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA) CEO Elon Musk tried to dial down expectations for Tuesday’s Battery Day presentation.

data.title: Competition getting tougher in electric vehicle market, analyst says
data.text: Felipe Munoz, global automotive analyst at JATO Dynamics, says the gap between Tesla and incumbent automakers in the electric vehicle sector is set to reduce in the coming years.

data.title: Tesla's 'Battery Day' drives reality check for recent share surge
data.text: Tesla Inc faced a stock market reality check on Wednesday after a much hyped "Battery Day" event which Wall Street analysts judged chiefly for its omissions and hazy delivery deadlines.

data.title: Tesla Sets Sights on a $25,000 Vehicle
data.text: New innovations in battery design and manufacturing will lead to the most affordable Tesla vehicle yet, Elon Musk says.

data.title: Major Tesla bear reacts to Battery Day promises
data.text: Tesla CEO Elon Musk offered new delivery predictions for 2020 at the company’s shareholder’s meeting on Tuesday, where the company also detailed a new battery design that it claims will make its cars cheaper to produce. Gordon Johnson, GLJ Research CEO and founder, joins "Squawk Box" to give his reaction.

data.title: Asian suppliers' shares slip on Tesla's cheaper battery plan
data.text: Shares of Asian battery suppliers fell on Wednesday after Tesla Inc outlined a plan to halve the cost of its electric vehicle batteries and bring more production of the key auto component in-house.

data.title: Tesla's stock drops, Baird analyst sees lack of catalysts with Battery Day in the rearview
data.text: Shares of Tesla Inc. TSLA, -5.59% dropped 5.4% in premarket trading Wednesday, after the leading electric vehicle maker's much-anticipated Battery Day appeared to disappoint investors.

data.title: What did Elon Musk say to make Tesla shares drop by $50bn?
data.text: Tesla's share value dropped by $50bn (£39bn) last night as investors reacted to  speeches by Elon Musk and other company executives at the company's battery day event.

data.title: Tesla's Battery Day is significant in the battle for auto industry dominance, says analyst
data.text: Based on what was unveiled at Tesla's Battery Day, Bill Russo of Automobility Limited is optimistic that the company will be able to integrate new battery technology within the three-year timeline, provided it has the development of the battery chemistries already proven.
